Package ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka

package ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    HttpKafkaPersistenceAdapter
    Kafka persistence adapter that serializes HTTP MessagePair instances into JSON and publishes them to Kafka.
    HttpKafkaPosterPipeline
    Kafka-backed poster pipeline that consumes serialized HTTP message pairs and renders poster reports.
    KafkaPosterOutputAdapter
    Kafka poster adapter that publishes formatted PosterOutputPort.PosterReport payloads to a Kafka topic.
    KafkaSegmentReader
    Kafka consumer wrapper that streams SegmentRecord instances from a topic.
    KafkaSegmentRecordReaderAdapter
    Bridges KafkaSegmentReader to the assemble use-case segment reader contract.
    SegmentKafkaSinkAdapter
    Kafka-backed SegmentPersistencePort that streams serialized TCP segments to a topic.
    Tn3270KafkaPersistenceAdapter
    Kafka persistence adapter that serializes TN3270 MessagePair instances into JSON and publishes them to Kafka.
    Tn3270KafkaPosterPipeline
    Kafka-backed poster pipeline that consumes TN3270 message pairs and renders poster reports.
